channel.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters
channel.description: Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub)

image.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters

item.title: 中国外交部长王毅在慕尼黑与布林肯举行“建设性”会谈
item.description: China's Foreign Minister Wang Yi discussed lifting sanctions against Chinese companies and individuals in a meeting with U.S. Secretary of State Antony Blinken at the Munich Security Conference, the Chinese foreign ministry said on Saturday.翻译:中国外交部周六表示，中国外交部长王毅在慕尼黑安全会议上会见美国国务卿安东尼·布林肯，讨论了取消对中国企业和个人的制裁。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 英国卡梅伦向中国外长提出红海和人权问题
item.description: British Foreign Minister David Cameron met his Chinese counterpart Wang Yi at the Munich Security Conference on Friday, the UK Foreign Office said in a statement.翻译:英国外交部在一份声明中表示，英国外交大臣戴维·卡梅伦周五在慕尼黑安全会议上会见了中国外交部长王毅。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 应力性骨折导致投球手贾米森长期缺席
item.description: Fast bowler Kyle Jamieson has been ruled out for the rest of the season after scans revealed a stress fracture in his back, New Zealand Cricket announced on Saturday.翻译:新西兰板球协会周六宣布，快速投球手凯尔·贾米森（Kyle Jamieson）在扫描显示背部应力性骨折后，将缺席本赛季余下的比赛。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 着眼于中国，美国高级议员誓言支持为太平洋岛屿提供资金
item.description: The Republican chairman of the U.S. House of Representatives Foreign Affairs Committee said on Friday he supported funding for U.S.-allied Pacific Island nations as a way to counter the influence of China, and would push to include them in any supplemental security aid bill.翻译:美国众议院外交事务委员会共和党主席周五表示，他支持向美国盟友太平洋岛国提供资金，以此作为对抗中国影响力的一种方式，并将推动将其纳入任何补充安全援助法案。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 意大利监管机构迫使 TikTok 删除“法国疤痕”挑战视频
item.description: Italy's communications authority AGCOM on Friday said it had forced social media app TikTok to remove some videos showing young people performing a dangerous practice known as the "French scar".翻译:意大利通讯当局 AGCOM 周五表示，已迫使社交媒体应用 TikTok 删除一些显示年轻人进行被称为“法国疤痕”的危险行为的视频。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 世贸组织总干事表示，在阿布扎比会议之前，战争和选举使世贸组织的交易变得复杂
item.description: The head of the World Trade Organization warned on Friday that it could be difficult to strike deals at a major ministerial meeting later this month given a spate of upcoming elections, recessions and wars in Ukraine and Gaza.翻译:世界贸易组织主席周五警告称，鉴于乌克兰和加沙即将举行一系列选举、经济衰退以及战争，本月晚些时候举行的一次重要部长级会议可能很难达成协议。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 大众汽车1月份在中国的交付量增长13%
item.description: Volkswagen on Friday said group deliveries rose 13.3% in January to 698,200 vehicles, with China the leading growth region.翻译:大众汽车周五表示，1 月份集团销量增长 13.3%，达到 698,200 辆，其中中国是增长最快的地区。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 早盘竞价：全球股市创两年高点，日经指数突破历史纪录
item.description: A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan翻译:迈克·多兰 (Mike Dolan) 对美国和全球市场未来一天的展望
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 台湾同意引进印度移民以缓解就业危机
item.description: Taiwan and India signed an agreement on Friday to bring in Indian migrant workers to the island as labour-strained Taipei seeks to expand its foreign workforce beyond its traditional source countries of Southeast Asia.翻译:台湾和印度周五签署了一项协议，将印度移民工人引入台湾，因为劳动力紧张的台北寻求将其外国劳动力扩大到其传统的东南亚来源国之外。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 独家：汇丰银行将改善与香港恒生银行的关系以降低风险
item.description: HSBC plans to tighten risk management at Hong Kong unit Hang Seng Bank due to worries about a potential rise in bad loans amid growing economic headwinds and property sector crisis in China, said two people with knowledge of the matter.翻译:两位知情人士表示，由于担心中国经济逆风加剧和房地产业危机可能导致不良贷款增加，汇丰银行计划加强香港子公司恒生银行的风险管理。
item.author: Sumeet Chatterjee, Engen Tham, Selena Li

item.title: 中国加强房地产行业“白名单”机制 - 媒体
item.description: Five state-owned Chinese banks have been matched with more than 8,200 residential projects for development loans under the "whitelist" mechanism aimed at injecting liquidity into the crisis-hit sector, government-backed media The Paper reported.翻译:据政府支持的媒体澎湃新闻报道，中国五家国有银行已在“白名单”机制下为超过8,200个住宅项目提供开发贷款，旨在为受危机打击的行业注入流动性。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 红海危机帮助竞争对手夺取业务，印度小型出口商陷入困境
item.description: Atul Jhunjhunwala, an exporter in the Indian eastern city of Kolkata, is tearing his hair out, having just lost another order due to the Red Sea crisis that has jacked up his shipping costs and times.翻译:印度东部城市加尔各答的出口商 Atul Jhunjhunwala 正抓狂，由于红海危机增加了他的运输成本和时间，他刚刚失去了另一份订单。
item.author: Manoj Kumar, Mayank Bhardwaj

item.title: 供应紧张之际，中国将在新加坡航展上展示国产客机
item.description: Singapore will play host to Asia's biggest air show next week for the first time since the end of COVID border restrictions, with regional travel rebounding and the military side of the show bristling with defensive systems and nervous arms buyers.翻译:新加坡将于下周举办自新冠疫情边境限制结束以来首次举办亚洲最大的航空展，地区旅行将出现反弹，展会的军事方面将布满防御系统和紧张的武器买家。
item.author: Lisa Barrington, Tim Hepher

item.title: 香港当局在价值18亿美元的洗钱案中逮捕了七人
item.description: Hong Kong authorities said on Friday they had arrested seven people suspected of being involved in a $1.8 billion money laundering case, the largest ever in the financial hub.翻译:香港当局周五表示，他们逮捕了 7 名涉嫌参与 18 亿美元洗钱案件的人，这是该金融中心有史以来规模最大的洗钱案件。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 澳大利亚葡萄酒制造商押注中国有望重新开放，并向香港大量发货
item.description: Australian wine makers have shipped millions of bottles of wine to Hong Kong in a bet that China will soon lift tariffs on Australian wine and revive a trade worth hundreds of millions of dollars, according to industry figures and trade data.翻译:根据行业数据和贸易数据，澳大利亚葡萄酒制造商已将数百万瓶葡萄酒运往香港，押注中国将很快取消对澳大利亚葡萄酒的关税并重振价值数亿美元的贸易。
item.author: Peter Hobson, Lewis Jackson

item.title: 美国生产者物价指数 (PPI) 数据强于预期，收益率和美元上涨
item.description: U.S. Treasury yields rose and the dollar edged up against the yen on Friday after data showed U.S. producer prices increased more than expected in January, adding to the view that any interest rate cuts by the Federal Reserve are not imminent.翻译:周五，数据显示美国1月份生产者价格涨幅超出预期，美国国债收益率上涨，美元兑日元小幅上涨，这进一步表明美联储不会立即降息。
item.author: Caroline Valetkevitch

item.title: 生产者价格因美联储降息前景而回落，美元稳定
item.description: The dollar retreated on Friday amid concerns about the strength of the U.S. economy after higher-than-expected producer prices raised expectations that the Federal Reserve will desist from cutting interest rates until at least the middle of the year.翻译:高于预期的生产者价格提高了人们对美联储至少在年中之前不会降息的预期，因对美国经济实力的担忧，美元周五回落。
item.author: Gertrude Chavez-Dreyfuss, Herbert Lash

item.title: 早间竞价：利率希望胜过经济恐慌
item.description: A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.翻译:展望未来一天的亚洲市场。
item.author: Jamie McGeever

item.title: 太平洋岛国对美国拖延资助感到担忧，对中国发出警告
item.description: Leaders of strategic U.S.-allied Pacific Island nations have become increasingly anxious about the U.S. congressional budget impasse that has delayed approval of vital new funding packages and warned that China is actively seeking to shift their allegiances, including over Taiwan.翻译:美国战略盟友太平洋岛国的领导人对美国国会预算僵局越来越感到焦虑，这一僵局导致重要的新融资方案的批准被推迟，并警告说，中国正在积极寻求改变他们的忠诚度，包括对台湾的忠诚度。
item.author: David Brunnstrom

item.title: 随着中国竞争的加剧，欧洲和美国汽车制造商竞相降低电动汽车成本
item.description: Under pressure from Chinese competitors, major U.S. and European auto manufacturers are pushing hard to cut electric vehicle costs so they can have price tags and profit margins similar to those of fossil-fuel models, industry executives said on Thursday.翻译:行业高管周四表示，在中国竞争对手的压力下，美国和欧洲主要汽车制造商正在大力削减电动汽车成本，以便获得与化石燃料车型相似的价格标签和利润率。
item.author: Nick Carey, Gilles Guillaume, Joseph White
